articles.author: Niamh Quinlan
articles.title: FactCheck: Is Ireland one of the only countries in Europe without indoor dining? - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: The claim was first made last Friday. The Journal FactCheck finds it to be true.
articles.content:
AN IMAGE BEING shared widely on social media in the past few days claims Ireland is one of the only countries in Europe where indoor dining is not currently permitted.
Source: Cosain/Twitter
The cl… [+8317 chars]

articles.title: Euro 2020: England beat Germany 2-0 to move into last eight - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Raheem Sterling and Harry Kane strike as England reach the quarter-finals of the European Championship.
articles.content:
Raheem Sterling and Harry Kane struck as England reached the quarter-finals of the European Championship with a 2-0 win over rivals Germany at Wembley on Tuesday.
England will play either Sweden or … [+1196 chars]

articles.title: England beat Germany to move into Euro last eight - SuperSport
articles.description: Raheem Sterling and Harry Kane struck late goals as England reached the quarterfinals of the European Championship with a 2-0 win over rivals Germany at Wembley on Tuesday.

articles.content:

articles.author: Deeptesh Sen
articles.title: Explained: What is EU’s new ‘vaccine passport’ programme and why Covishield has not been included? - The Indian Express
articles.description: With the new vaccine passport system coming into effect across EU from July 1, the absence of Covishield from the list of EMA-approved vaccines can be of particular concern for Indians who hope to travel to European countries soon.
articles.content: Covishield manufactured by Serum Institute of India is not among the vaccines which have been approved by the European Medicines Agencys (EMA) for the vaccine passport programme that allows free move… [+6022 chars]

articles.author: Delfin Dioquino
articles.title: Baldwin urges young Gilas Pilipinas to learn from Serbia, Milos Teodosic - Rappler
articles.description: An accomplished player in the European circuit, Serbian star Milos Teodosic is expected to give Gilas Pilipinas a hard time in the FIBA Olympic Qualifying Tournament
